summary: The root test suite container for WarpDatasets, organizing both unit and integration tests to ensure the reliability of remote-first data access and artifact resolution. It serves as the centralized entry point for the pytest-based validation framework across the entire codebase.
responsibilities: Organize the testing hierarchy into unit and integration sub-domains
Provide a package-level entry point for the pytest discovery mechanism
Ensure coverage for remote HTTP range requests and Parquet streaming
Validate deterministic versioning and cache safety invariants
Coordinate end-to-end workflow verification involving DuckDB and remote manifests
